snippet.title: HIRAETH | OFFICIAL TRAILER - Full Game
snippet.description:
WISHLIST HIRAETH on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2361040/HIRAETH/

HIRAETH's official cinematic trailer for all four chapters. Coming soon.

HIRAETH is a game about mind-bending puzzles and unique platforming challenges, all with stunning graphics and physics-defying mechanics. The overarching plot is a puzzle as in of itself, and the ever-present music elevates the game's dreamy atmosphere. The looming and intensifying creepy aura begs the question: what secrets hide beyond what AMPER want you to see? Will your own mind even be capable of comprehending it?

Traverse AMPER Laboraties, your prison, and uncover the mysteries of the ones who run it.

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/cawezstudios
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/EtX7Xv7txY
ITCH.IO: https://cawezstudios.itch.io/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/cawezstudios
REDDIT: https://www.reddit.com/user/cawez_studios/
SOUNDCLOUD: https://soundcloud.com/vestigetunes
